actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that it remains the policy of the United States not to recognize in any way the annexation of the Baltic nations by the Soviet Union, the President's signature on the Final Act of the Conference on Security and Cooperation in Europe notwithstanding.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that it remains the policy of the United States not to recognize in any way the annexation of the Baltic nations (Estonia, Latvia, and Lithuania) by the Soviet Union, the President's signature on the Final Act of the Conference on Security and Cooperation in Europe notwithstanding.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that it remains the policy of the United States not to recognize in any way the annexation of the Baltic nations by the Soviet Union, the President's signature on the Final Act of the Conference on Security and Cooperation in Europe notwithstanding.
